Clash didn't move as he had frozen in the air as Aerotaur slashed. He
laughed. Mech fluid suddenly poured from his chest. The wound began to heal.
Clash's arm at once suddenly falls off. Clash looked around him at all of
the ones watching, then he saw Serge. He looked to the base. He knew a wound
like this was going to take several minutes of rest to heal. He bows in air
and flies quickly, heading away from the base...

----- Original Message -----
From: <Rudra656@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, January 17, 2001 9:13 PM
Subject: Re: Battle in Neutral base


> ::Aerotaur::
>     He whipped his head around to look at Clash.  As Clash flew at him he
> launched himself backward the blades leaving narrow lines of mech fluid on
> his chest.  He quickly drew his staff and made a retaliatory slash.
>
>
>
